org.trafodion.sql.udr

Class LmClassLoader

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.lang.ClassLoader
      • java.security.SecureClassLoader
        • org.trafodion.sql.udr.LmClassLoader

  • public class LmClassLoader
extends SecureClassLoader
    LmClassLoader is an extension of SecureClassLoader. This class is responsible for loading the classes from its search path. Search Path includes external path(the directory specified in 'external path' clause of 'create procedure' statement) and CLASSPATH env variable. This class always checks external path first before checking CLASSPATH. CLASSPATH can be removed from the search path by calling removeCpURLs() and added by addCpURLs(). This facility is provided to have the main class (the one specified in 'external name' clause of 'create procedure') loaded only from 'external path'. Typically, applications call removeCpURLs() before loading main class and call addCpURLs() after loading the class.

      Creates a new instance for given external path.

    • Constructor Detail

      • LmClassLoader

        public LmClassLoader(String extPath,
             int debug)
        Creates a new instance for given external path. And adds external path to the search path.
        Parameters:
        extPath - external path this instance is responsible for
        debug - debug flag

    • Method Detail

      • setClassPath

        public static void setClassPath(String classPath)
        Sets the classpath. This classpath is seen by all the LmClassLoader instances.
        Parameters:
        classPath - CLASSPATH to set

      • size

        public int size()
        Accessor method to get the size of all the loaded classes by this ClassLoader.
        Returns:
        size of all the loaded classes.

      • addCpURLs

        public void addCpURLs()
        Adds CLASSPATH URLs to the search path of this ClassLoader instance.

      • removeCpURLs

        public void removeCpURLs()
        Removes CLASSPATH URLs from the search list of this ClassLoader instance. CLASSPATH won't be checked for ClassLoading until addCpURLs() is called.
